website_summaries.verdict: A bench with a unique design that is sure to draw eyes in. Good for indoor or yard use.
pros: All metal construction and finish provide a great focal point in any room
cons: Bench is less comfortable to sit on than other options

customer_reviews.title: Husband’s first comment, “It’s Mine If We Get Divorced.”
customer_reviews.text: Kidding aside, this bench is stunning! I purchased it for the end of our king sized bed and I couldn’t be happier. Packaged very well, beautiful quality, wonderful design. If I had seen this in a store I would have been texting my husband to see if he objected to me spending $2,000.00 on a bench....but it was just a fraction of that cost. Happy, happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: LostMyLuggage

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase, great price, sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Looks just like the pictures. Came wrapped in protective wrapping and cardboard. No damage whatsoever. Very easy to open, and no assembly required. Pretty comfortable to sit on - have had kids (10 to 12 years old) and adults use it at the dining room table without problem. Could be a little uncomfortable if you have a "bony butt". Could easily add some padding on top if you needed to. Has some pads on the feet to not scratch your floors. Easy to move (35 pounds each). Sturdy - seems to hold weight without any problem.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bench
customer_reviews.text: I could not be happier! Just like the picture, arrived on time in a perfect condition, I know it’s a bench but I’m going to use it as a coffee table and it looks amazing, it matches perfect with the bottom feet of the couch! Highly recommended for Whatever use you need it for!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and looks GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to purchase this bench, because the price was lower than most of the other retailers, but then I didn't want to over pay for the exact same item either, so I took a chance and ordered it, which I'm SO HAPPY that I did, because it looks great, it feels very sturdy, and I can't believe the cost because it looks like a very expensive piece of furniture! It's modern and sleek, and it goes great with all my very expensive RH furniture, I highly recommend this stainless steel bench! I just wish I had room in my house for the other matching pieces I would buy them all!
customer_reviews.author: Fred Barreras

customer_reviews.title: What a delightful surprise
customer_reviews.text: Bought this with great trepidation (buying furniture on-line is tricky at best) but knowing Amazon's return policy we felt it was worth a try. Arrived quickly as promised (via UPS - delivery man was not too happy it is big and bulky - what can you expect with a 60" wide bench that is in one piece). It was packed/padded very well (NB: they warn you to save packing material, just in case) and arrived in perfect condition. When we opened we found a well made, nicely finished bench which wow are using as a coffee table. Works perfectly for our purposes. All in all, I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: HSNYC

customer_reviews.title: Wow. Beautiful, useful & high quality
customer_reviews.text: It looks like the pictures. It’s loud yet minimalist. It can catch your eye or at certain perspectives it blends with my table’s metal legs making it seem invisible. I got the biggest bench for my dining room and love it! Everyone that comes over compliments it. It’s a bench so it’s not going to be the most luxurious seat in the house but it’s one of the prettiest in mine. The slats don’t bother but may if sat on for extended periods of time that could be different. A cushion or pillow can solve that easily. It can go anywhere a bench should be and more. I do plan on buying a smaller one for my room.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous Statement Piece
customer_reviews.text: I bought the large stainless bench and I love it. I have it sitting in the office section of our home, alongside our IKEA furniture. So glad I decided to go with this instead of a plain white country bench I was looking at to match our book shelves. I certainly made the better choice and would not have felt as satisfied with my purchase if I had gone with the latter (from another site I can't recall now).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value and conversation piece
customer_reviews.text: It’s what I expected from photos and description. It had a couple of small, brown pits in the finish is why I knocked off a star. It’s used as a stand for my 75” tv and is perfect for that use. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: amos

customer_reviews.title: Wrong colored product, delayed delivery and response to problem.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered silver tone; delivered unpleasant gold. Promises of “special team” working on it. Appears promises forgotten as no action or plan. The product is heavy, sturdy. Useless to me in the color sent.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Turrisi

customer_reviews.title: Lousy Rusting Priduct
customer_reviews.text: This SUPPOSEDLY stainless steel bench has rusted and is unsightly. This happened within one month after the Amazon refund window had closed. After I contacted Modway, they told me to deal with Amazon. SO UNHELPFUL. DO NOT BUY THIS.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful little piece. It is exactly as it looks and described and is very sturdy. Also the price on Amazon is considerably less than anywhere else I’ve seen it being sold. I highly recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: G. Corrado

customer_reviews.title: GREAT STYLE, GREAT PRICE ,GOOD QUALITY!
customer_reviews.text: GREAT STYLE, GREAT PRICE ,GOOD QUALITY! beautiful piece of furniture, I love it. Ill be buying more from Modway.
customer_reviews.author: No

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Piece of Furniture.... Excellent Price
customer_reviews.text: This was beautifully packaged, easily unpacked and required NO set up. It looks exactly as it is pictured and is a great value at this price point. I have seen as high as $400 and $800 on other sites. It is solidly constructed and the contemporary styling is very attractive.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, just as expected.
customer_reviews.text: This product is beautiful, and good for the price. Was trying to find something like this at an affordable price, and that's exactly what I got from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa B.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It came nicely packaged and has a nice shine. Glad I made the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lovely bench
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful bench. Great quality and look. It is a statement piece but be careful on the size. I am not using it where I originally intended but another plus is that it so versatile it can work in multiple rooms and designs.
customer_reviews.author: Lori cj

customer_reviews.title: Great looks and value!
customer_reviews.text: Sleek modern look and great value for product+shipping. Simple/fast delivery. Well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: JPEG

customer_reviews.title: WOW What a product
customer_reviews.text: This is so much more than I was expecting an amazing Bench and best addition to my remodeling yet!
customer_reviews.author: Dewey Williams

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a Preamplifier
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for the silver Yamaha preamplifier, completes the look nicely with the white and silver Kef Q350's, and the pair of white Audioengine S8's. I've heard better systems but none look as sleek with this small, polished bench.
customer_reviews.author: Dan S. Higgins

customer_reviews.title: FABULOUS
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these and they exceeded what I expected! Absolutely excellent product in every way! I've had mine for 6 years and they are as pretty as the day I purchased them!
customer_reviews.author: Sky TLG

customer_reviews.title: Looks amazing
customer_reviews.text: Very solid, cool mirror look, surprisingly comfy to sit on, and delivery was very easy
customer_reviews.author: SadSandwich

customer_reviews.title: Two Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This bench is gorgeous! It was delivered in a very well wrap box. The piece is very clean line and airy looking. Looks like chrome polish finish and had an ultra modern look!
customer_reviews.author: T. Phan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: All the people who come to my house loved. I’m so glad I bought it . Thank Modway
customer_reviews.author: B. C.

customer_reviews.title: Sharp looking bench.  Sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Sharp looking bench. Sturdy. Used in our business. Purchased again when we added another location.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations
customer_reviews.text: This product exceeded my expectations. Durable, highly polished service. Good quality. I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful bench and a fraction of the price as similar ones from fancy furniture stores!
customer_reviews.author: Dentite

customer_reviews.title: Great modern look!
customer_reviews.text: Really like the modern look. Using in a master bedroom as bench at end of bed. Sleek and clean looking!!

customer_reviews.title: A great bench!
customer_reviews.text: The packing job was amazing? The bench is very strong with zero assembly needed.

customer_reviews.title: I wish I could afford more from this collection.
customer_reviews.text: I so LOVE this ultra modern bench. It adds just the right amount of sleek style to our foyer.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph V. Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Staple bench!
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely a conversation piece. I use it in my entertainment room.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Designer look and quality
customer_reviews.text: This bench knocks it out of the park. Super sturdy. Super modern. Super quality. Looks and performs like a true designer piece. Makes a great luggage rack and bench.
customer_reviews.author: CanyonCat

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: looks very nice. very durable for my kids. It completes the modern look

customer_reviews.title: It's a beautiful bench
customer_reviews.text: This is such a stunning bench, a total visual treat in your home. Amazingly it is very comfortable to sit on as well. We use it without any cushions.
customer_reviews.author: kanika aggarwal

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I was looking for. Sleek and streamlined. Very simple and clean looking. Love it. Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Moderns art, modern furniture....it is unique and makes the place different from regular furnitures. The quality seems good and strong.
customer_reviews.author: juan ascanio

customer_reviews.title: The bench came perfectly packed but Initially I was disappointed since it had a small piece of metal sticking ...
customer_reviews.text: The bench came perfectly packed but Initially I was disappointed since it had a small piece of metal sticking out of the rib. I was able to push it inside and now it’s perfectly fine. I may even buy it again, this time for my son.
customer_reviews.author: ninella patish

customer_reviews.title: Great table also as useful as seating.
customer_reviews.text: It looks great, light enough to move around and sturdy enough to sit on. The styling really works in a modern setting.
customer_reviews.author: Hank Schonzeit

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I Love, Love this Bench!! Its looks great in my Living room as extra seating.
customer_reviews.author: Sparkle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy...appears exactly as picture. Love the contemporary style. Placed 2 together and is exactly the look I invisioned.

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: I love it ! I Great , quick delivery . Looks exactly like the picture , very modern , good quality
customer_reviews.author: IZABELA

customer_reviews.title: Very Cool!
customer_reviews.text: As pictured, Nicely finished, well packaged. Has leveling legs too! Very nice....
customer_reviews.author: Most Handsome

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks is great but one of the 3 I ordered came damaged and can't get ahold of vendor
customer_reviews.author: Margaret A.

customer_reviews.title: sturdy, well packaged for shipping
customer_reviews.text: modern looking.. sturdy, well packaged for shipping...I am using this as a bench in my hallway to put on shoes... Can you guys make a smaller version of this.. something that fits underneath this bench as a shoe rack?
customer_reviews.author: Leon R. Situ

customer_reviews.title: LexMod Gridiron Larga Steiless STeel
customer_reviews.text: This modern bench is very nice and minimal. Exactly what I expected, very happy to buy ths with great price.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Hostettler

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: We chose this modern table/bench as an accent table between two modern gray chairs and it works perfectly. It is a quality piece that fits in with our minimalist philosophy. It was packed very well.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph T.

customer_reviews.title: nice bench/table
customer_reviews.text: The gridiron table /bench was exactly as depicted. It is solid and attractive. Exactly what I wanted. I may order another one.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. C. J. Mackey

customer_reviews.title: Great bench for great price!
customer_reviews.text: We love this bench! Totally sturdy and a much better price than other websites!
customer_reviews.author: susan field

customer_reviews.title: Stainless steel bench is as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The bench is solid, very attractive and sleek. It's exactly as advertised. We can put a tray on it, or a cushion if we need it for seating. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: VICTORIA LANDON

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic and nice product. Nice packaging also Will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Michael Tran

customer_reviews.title: a great accent to our dining table
customer_reviews.text: this was exactly like what was described and shown in the picture. we love the modern look it gives to our dining room!
customer_reviews.author: angel

product_meta.title: Modway Large Gridiron Stainless Steel Bench
product_meta.description: Size:Large BenchStraight lines were once deemed the realm of strict logic. This conduit design accomplishes something quite profound. It blends linear components with a pleasantly stainless steel tubular effect. Modernism used to be about extremes. Wild shapes and patterns that don’t dare resemble its predecessors. We’ve reached an age of maturity of sorts. We appreciate style, but all the more, we respect those designs that represent a blending of cultures. The Gridiron tubular stainless steel bench is famous not for its radical shape, but for the strategic transcendence that it provides. Gridiron is perfect for reception rooms, living and lounge areas, and any other place in need of transformation.
feature_bullets: CONTEMPORARY MODERN STYLE - Harmonizing mid-century design and contemporary modern appeal, this bench boasts grate-inspired detail, sleek lines and polished finish, a perfect piece for the modern home
VERSATILE FORM - A striking addition to the dining room table, the foot of the bed in a bedroom, and also a mudroom, foyer, or living room, this decorative bench both functional and effortlessly chic
LASTING CONSTRUCTION - Sturdily made, this entryway bench is thoughtfully built of durable stainless steel. A supportive seat or accent piece, this metal bench is a lasting choice and easy to clean

BENCH MEASUREMENTS - The indoor bench is a stunning statement in many décors including modern, contemporary, and industrial. Product Dimensions: 60"L x 15"W x 17"H; Tube Dimensions: 1"L x 1.5"W x .5"H

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars108 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
